mean_cn: n. 无线电讯，无线的，无线电的；  vi. 打无线电报；  adj. 不用电线的
mean_en: not using wires to send and receive electronic signals :sending and receiving electronic signals by using radio waves
word_etyma: wire电线 + less “无...的”、“不...的” → wireless adj. 无线的；无线电的
sentence: Mobile phones can receive data through wireless networks.
sentence_trans: 手机通过无线可以接收数据。
